name: Cash Crisis: Programmers Search for Money
overview: 1989 saw the release of fun little Shoot 'em up game called Cash Crisis: Programmers Search for Money on the Amiga systems, created and published by Barry Brown for free as a Public Domain. Music arranged and composed by Howie Davies. Even if it's only a very simple shoot 'em up, this game is really funny and atmospheric, and the music is awesome.
